701914f-a.text:
(1)
Trinity Avenue, west side, at Pontiac Place. The stairway on the side of the cliff leads up to an old stone house. The view is
southward.
June 25, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A split rock from the cliff (seen in view 1).
June 25, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
701914f-a.folder: Trinity Avenue & Pontiac Place, Bronx, NY

701916f-a.text:
Trinity Avenue, north from Pontiac Place to Westchester Avenue. On the latter is the elevated structure of the I.R.T. subway.
June 25, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
